video.title: El Dragón: Return of a Warrior
video.synopsis: To replace his grandfather as head of a cartel, a Tokyo financier returns to his home country of Mexico, where he must battle two rivals for control.

episodes.synopsis: An attempt to overthrow the head of a transport cartel brings Tokyo financier Miguel back to his Mexican hometown. A nightclub celebration turns tragic.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Lamberto calls an urgent meeting of his cartel's regional leaders, including Epigmenio. A funeral reunites two old friends. Asya receives grave news.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Miguel moves back to Ciudad Jiménez, where a near accident introduces him to a new friend. Chisca indulges in a risky lifestyle to forget a past trauma.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: On the golf green, Miguel offers Carlos Duarte a proposal, and later travels to Miami to set up a shell company and find a frontman for it.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After Miguel returns to Mexico City, Epigmenio orders Tacho to kill him. Lamberto learns a terrible truth related to the death of his son 16 years ago.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: An evening at a pub takes a sudden turn for Miguel and Adela, leading to a big shake-up within El Salado and a change of residence for the Garzas.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Epigmenio starts forging new alliances. Chisca makes life difficult for Adela. Karina finds herself being hunted by one of her Russian mafia contacts.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Miguel sets out to eliminate a threat to his plans: Sergei. While interviewing Natalia's parents, Héctor finds a lead. Chisca learns how to use spyware.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Miguel tries to eliminate those bidding on the Grace prototype. Jorge starts working with Kenia and Flaco. Chisca plans her revenge against Valentín.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Miguel sets a contingency plan in motion to try to save Peligros's life and salvage the auction scheme. In Madrid, Chisca reconnects with Valentín.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Héctor and Claudia examine the locker's contents. Jaramillo tortures Miguel to learn who he works for. Chisca finds a way to lure Valentín to Mexico.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Epigmenio gets revenge against Enano. In Colombia, Miguel struggles to escape from the gunmen chasing him. Adela helps Jorge choose a gift for Kenia.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Chisca launches a plan to kill Valentín, but an unexpected turn of events gives her second thoughts. Jimena makes her feelings for Miguel known to him.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Héctor gets Natalia's laptop decrypted by Flaco. Miguel takes Adela to Miami for an industry party. Valentín encourages Chisca to misbehave.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: When an emergency arises, Jorge sees Valentín's true colors. Howard taps the phone of Ecogreen's frontman. Adela's driving skills are put to the test.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Vladimir seeks revenge against his daughter's abductors. Héctor interviews Natalia's former co-worker. The Pacheco brothers get special instructions.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: During his meeting with the Pacheco brothers, Miguel receives a secret plea for help. Jimena finds herself in a forced meeting with Epigmenio.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: The Pacheco brothers storm the ranch in Ciudad Jiménez. Adela sees a colder side of Miguel. Héctor visits the man who's in prison for killing Natalia.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Miguel leads an operation to rescue Dora. Kenia is tasked with distracting Jorge to keep him from finding out the bad news. The car bomb awaits Héctor.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Jorge learns why Kenia invited him to her home. Miguel makes a decision that upsets Jimena. A phone tip leads Dora to ask Peligros for a big favor.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Adela gives a speech at the foundation's launch party. Héctor travels to Ciudad Jiménez to interview the owner of the nightclub where his sister died.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Tadamichi sends Miguel to broker a drug deal with the Serbian mob, but Epigmenio finds out about it and decides to interfere. Adela meets a new man.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Miguel launches an all-out effort to find the stolen drugs. Jimena makes a surprising offer to Chisca. Héctor gets into a tricky situation with Juana.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: With Peligros's help, Miguel arranges a distraction so a delicate swap can be made. Adela and Víctor go on a date. Héctor finds a clue on Juana's phone.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: After his men are ambushed by Halcón's, Epigmenio seeks help from Duarte. Stock market activity spurs IRS agent Howard to pay a visit to Ecogreen's CEO.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Jimena meets with Hans Pritken at his pharmaceutical lab and snoops around. Víctor makes a grand gesture toward Adela. Héctor publishes an exposé.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Chisca's latest stunt forces Miguel to send her to rehab. A member of El Salado shows his true colors. The hackers devise a plan to break into the lab.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Jimena's arrival at the lab with Pritken complicates the team's departure. Miguel overhears Víctor in a suspicious phone conversation.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Miguel sets out to poach Alí Farchala while keeping him safe from Pritken. Jimena uses Chisca to win Miguel's favor. Ángel and Chisca try something new.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Miguel grows suspicious of Coyote. A trip to their hometown brings Adela and Miguel closer together. Ángel retaliates against Chisca for her infidelity.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Héctor's wife returns home at the worst possible moment. Miguel wrestles with his fear of falling in love. Ángel's video comes to the Garzas' attention.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Chisca introduces herself to Valentín's wife. Claudia warns Ana that Héctor is writing a dangerous article. Jorge asks Kenia to be his first.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Miguel's reaction to the magazine article leads Adela to a decision. Epigmenio is betrayed by one of his own. Valentín gives Chisca an assignment.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Héctor publishes an article revealing what Chano told him. Duarte learns the IRS is investigating Miguel. Adela confronts the loiterer she keeps seeing.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Adela shares with Dora what Gato confessed to her. Zaragoza sees proof that Coyote is a traitor. Miguel tries to broker a truce between Jun and Goro.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Miguel races to save Tadamichi from the trap he's walked into. Valentín receives intel from Chisca. A new resident comes to live at the Garza home.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Miguel proposes a deal to Epigmenio. Héctor's use of an ATM reveals his whereabouts. Dora makes the mistake of using a landline to call Zaragoza.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Ana calls Miguel to help find Héctor. Miguel receives a summons from the attorney general. Duarte realizes he must get rid of a liability: Miguel.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: In the chaotic aftermath of the explosion, one life hangs in the balance while another is lost. Ishiro tries to keep Chisca on the straight and narrow.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The attorney general investigates the courier who delivered the bomb. Dora takes action to keep secret the person behind the murder of Miguel's parents.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Héctor tracks down the ballistics results in his sister's case. Chisca hacks into Valentín's laptop camera. Miguel tests the drug Efilina on himself.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ishiro is tasked with stealing Adri's and her dad's phones and deleting their incriminating text messages. Miguel learns who supplied Chisca with drugs.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: After learning about the attorney general's new evidence, Epigmenio demands a sacrifice from Tacho. Jimena takes steps to win back Miguel's trust.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: IRS agent Howard Toledo hires a hacker to break into Naga Company's IT network. Miguel travels to Miami, where an actress asks him for help.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Naga Company leaks Sunny Productions' new films. The attorney general shares her intel with Howard. Miguel goes to Spain to negotiate two partnerships.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Miguel visits a Seville winery that would be perfect for storing ephiline, but must convince the owner to sell. Adela encounters a battered woman.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Chisca agrees to steal the ephiline from Miguel's room, but must first get past Ishiro. Miguel's negotiations with María Terry take an unexpected turn.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Pharmaceutical mogul Hans Pritken learns his lab scientist Ali is alive and well. Valentín decides it's time to eliminate his main obstacle: Ishiro.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Miguel tries a new strategy with María Terry. Héctor uses his newfound info on Braulio's wife to get the prisoner to reconsider his stay behind bars.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: When Chisca calls Valentín with her good news, he and Piero launch a plan to escape from Spain with the prototype. Braulio asks Epigmenio for a favor.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Epigmenio gives Lobo his next mission. Kenia receives a message that rattles her nerves. Miguel surprises Adela with a specially planned evening.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: While visiting her husband's grave, Dora makes a vow. Braulio's cellmate fulfills his promise. Kenia takes harsh measures in order to protect Jorge.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: As the victim of the drive-by shooting fights to survive, Duarte faces backlash from the press. Dora visits Tacho in prison and offers him a deal.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Dora's hitmen follow Lobo to a safehouse where Epigmenio is hiding. When Braulio awakens, Ishiro and Peligros must extract him from the prison hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Jimena meets with Guido to learn about his app. Miguel takes Adela to Nepal, where ephiline production is underway. Weeks later, the drug is released.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Héctor orders his doctor to tell him the truth. Peligros finds out Epigmenio is alive and well. Kenia is forced to defend herself against Christian.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Tensions run high as Miguel's guests arrive on the island and are subjected to security protocols. Kenia takes a risk to fulfill her end of a bargain.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Kenia tries to get rid of the tracker in a place where it won't be found. Epigmenio makes a claim that shocks Miguel, and later seeks an ally.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Kenia comes clean to Jorge. Hoping to find out who killed Miguel's parents, Adela goes undercover in order to befriend Epigmenio's wife.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Ecogreen's frontman Leopoldo balks when Jimena presents him with new documents to sign. Adela tries to explain to Carmen why she left so suddenly.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: Howard sends Leopoldo on a mission to steal from Jimena the documents proving Ecogreen is buying Pídenos. Duarte faces competition for the presidency.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Miguel tasks his team with finding a way to recover the oil lost in the spill. Forced by his wife, Héctor returns to work. Dora pays a secret visit.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Tacho plots his escape from prison and sets his plan in motion. Someone accidentally discovers Lobo and Carmen's affair — and gets proof on video.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Tacho confronts Epigmenio. Howard's hacker manages to infiltrate Naga Company's IT network. Adela gets Carmen to open up about Miguel's parents.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: Miguel arrives in Miami, where Howard sends out his lure to trap him. Adela is shocked when she sees Carmen. Ishiro hosts a special evening for Chisca.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Tacho enlists his parents to gather intel on Miguel's recent operations in Mexico. Suspicious of Kenia, Jorge decides to tail her.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Adela carefully considers the proposal she's been offered. The attorney general receives a tip about an incoming shipment of ephiline.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: Howard threatens Karina Grishenko with prison time to get her to lead Miguel into a trap. Jorge asks Flaco to investigate the man he photographed.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Adela must find a way to delete the photo of her on Carmen's phone before Epigmenio meets with his wife. Ishiro embarks on his next mission.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: A judge grants Edna a brief window of opportunity to collect evidence against Miguel. When Howard learns Adela is in Miami, he targets her next.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Carmen sets a trap and Adela takes the bait. Hans Pritken forces Jimena to summon the ephiline lab's new head. Duarte's secretary gives Héctor a lead.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: When Duarte starts a rumor that could destroy Miguel's drug business, Héctor fights back by publishing the photograph he secretly took.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: Miguel's scientists race to determine the victims' exact cause of death. Kenia tries to break into the computer Flaco set up to store top-secret data.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Flaco follows Kenia. A reward for info on Epigmenio's whereabouts tempts one of Jaramillo's men. Edna overhears a horrifying phone conversation.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: As Kenia runs for her life, Adela begs Miguel to spare her. A halt in ephiline production spurs Miguel's partners to take matters into their own hands.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Jorge recovers his suppressed memory. Héctor helps Edna find Braulio so he can testify against Duarte. Miguel's associates decide to replace him.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: Jorge demands to speak to Epigmenio. Duarte's secretary's testimony opens a forensic investigation to determine Natalia's true cause and place of death.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: Seeing the aftermath of the ambush, Jorge goes after Epigmenio. Duarte desperately seeks help to escape the country. Jimena makes her exit.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: A month later, a revenge plan unfolds to destroy the business partners who betrayed Miguel, including Piero, Kuang, Drenka and the Russian mafia.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Miguel enlists Héctor to help frame the Valley Organization for the recent murders of the drug bosses, and to tell Edna where Epigmenio has been hiding.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Gary tracks down the car that followed him to Kenia's safe house. Carmen calls Adela and asks to meet. Miguel notices an oddity in the audio recording.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: Miguel asks Epigmenio about the audio recording. The framing of Edna brings unexpected consequences. Dora reveals a long-held secret to Miguel.
episodes.title: Episode 44
